--- id: ls01 cost: $10.00 paypal_id: TCXNLESZTHB5Q product_name: Landsknechte with Zweihänder (Great Swords) rss: https://picasaweb.google.com/data/feed/base/user/112010499415177474102/albumid/6064921866290844353?alt=rss&kind=photo&authkey=Gv1sRgCKTVpZa7nMT7tQE&hl=en_US local_nav_weight: 110 short_title: Zweihänder (Great Swords) title: 10mm Landsknechte with Zweihänder (Great Swords) ---

Some Landsknechte Doppelsöldner (double pay-earners) were armed with two-handed swords and charged with sowing disorder amongst enemy pike blocks.

This is a Zweihänder (Great Swords) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve one standard bearer/musician strip (ls01a) and fourteen rank and file strips (a mix of ls01b–h). Bases are not included.

Sculpted by Bob Naismith and cast by D & D Model Cleaning & Casting in lead free pewter.
